name: ArcGIS Map Template
summary: Learn about .MXT files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: ArcMap uses a file named Normal.mxt as the default template for every new map created in the software. The file is located in \​Documents and Settings\​[user]\​Application Data\​ESRI\​Templates\​ and can be modified to create a custom default template.

If no user-specific Normal.mxt exists in the user's templates directory, ArcMap then searches for the file in the ArcGIS\​Bin\​Templates\​ installation directory and copies it to the user's templates directory.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
